Source code for Playground.Python_Staff.Functions_.functionAttribute

# broken example from book it maybe worked in older than 3.5.2 version of python

[docs]def tester(start):
    def nested(label):
        print(label, nested.state)
        nested.state += 1
        nested.state = start
    return nested


# F = tester(0)
# F("spam")
# F('dupa')
#
# g = tester(33)
# g("spam2")
# F('dupa2')



[docs]def func(x):
    if(x):func.count = 0
    print(func.count)

if __name__ == "__main__":

    f = func
    f(True)
    f.count = 1
    f(False)
